alert.note: Alert for Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Southern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Northern Lake County; Okeechobee; Orange; Osceola; Seminole; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 20 at 6:24AM EST until November 20 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility dropping below one quarter mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Interior sections of east central Florida, plus parts of Brevard and western Volusia Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Surface observations, satellite imagery and traffic cameras continue to show dense fog in the advisory area. The dense fog will continue past sunrise, then gradually burn off by 9 AM. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Drivers should prepare to encounter significant reductions in visibility this morning, especially during the rush hour commute. When driving in dense fog, slow down, use only your low beam headlights, and leave extra distance between your vehicle and the one in front of you. &&
